name: Bitten with Duty
description:
This Game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

The Theme was "Out of Control".

In the game you are a father in a zombie Apocalypse. You are bitten by a zombie and losing slowly control over your body. While you fighting against the virus you are trying to get supplies for your familiy so they can survive without you.

This game was made solo by me. I Hope you have some fun :)
